text: Egh gɨn ofa gamir gumazim bunbamɨn avɨzimningɨn suiragh, an namnam abɨkigh, egh an avɨzimning bar aning asian markɨ. Egh aneteghtɨ, avim bar an isi mangɨtɨ a bar mɨghɨrigh, averenir kɨnimɨn otogh. A kamaghɨn damutɨ, Ikiavɨra Itir God ofan bar isi mɨghɨramimɨn kuarazir kamɨn mughuriam baregh, egh a gifuegh navir aghuim an ikiam.”
